name: Scrolling & Looping
description:
Scrolling & Looping

Just find the exit to next level. Besides your 4 ways moves, you can switch the view to scroll or loop around. See, it's easy, what could go wrong?

Made for the Lospec Jam 1. 

Controls
  • Arrow keys or WASD/ZQSD to move
  • Spacebar, Z, C or N as main button
  • Escape, Left Ctrl, X, V or M as secondary button (only used to quick close menus)
  • Enter or P to bring menus.
Notes

Like with so many game jams this ended in quite a rush, with too few levels (those are quite difficult but fun to create, a whole game on itself) and a wish for better UI & UX overall, but I think this game have nice mechanics to expand. It was mainly an opportunity for me to boost my Javascript knowledge, especially ES6, so I made this little game engine from scratch, with some advices and beta testing from Florent A., thanks pal! So from this point of view I'm quite happy with the result, even though last hours took their toll on code cleaness and consistency.
